terms.title: Terms and Conditions

scope.title: § 1 Scope
scope.text1: These General Terms and Conditions (Terms) apply to all contracts between Inspiroware OÜ (hereinafter "Provider") and users of the DomainAudit Pro platform (hereinafter "User") regarding the use of website analysis services.
scope.text2: Conflicting or deviating conditions of the user are not recognized unless their validity is expressly confirmed in writing.

services.title: § 2 Subject Matter
services.text: The provider offers a web platform that enables:
services.feature1: Technical analysis of websites (SSL, performance, SEO)
services.feature4: API access for automated queries (Enterprise Plan)
services.plans: Services are offered in different plans (Free, Enterprise).

usage.title: § 3 Usage Rights and Obligations
usage.allowed1: Commercial and private use within the limits of the selected plan
usage.allowed2: Analysis of websites you are authorized to analyze or that are publicly accessible
usage.allowed3: Export and reuse of analysis results
usage.prohibited1: Misuse of the platform for illegal purposes
usage.prohibited3: Reverse engineering or copying of the software

pricing.title: § 4 Prices and Payment Terms
pricing.enterprise1: Prices according to current price list
pricing.vatNote: All prices are subject to applicable VAT. Payment is made in advance by credit card or SEPA direct debit.

termination.title: § 5 Term and Termination
termination.freePlan: Free Plan: Can be terminated at any time without notice.
termination.enterprisePlan: Enterprise Plan: The minimum term is one month. The contract renews automatically for the selected period unless terminated with 30 days' notice before the end of the term.
termination.notice: Terminations must be made in writing (email is sufficient) to hi@inspiroware.com.

availability.title: § 6 Availability and Warranty
availability.uptime: The provider aims for 99% availability but cannot guarantee it. Maintenance work will be announced when possible.
availability.dataAccuracy: Analysis results are based on publicly available data and external APIs. No warranty is given for accuracy and completeness.
availability.defects: Defects must be reported immediately in writing. For justified complaints, the provider will remedy the defect or reduce compensation accordingly.

liability.title: § 7 Liability
liability.limitation: The provider's liability is limited to intent and gross negligence. No liability for indirect damages, lost profits, or consequential damages, except in case of breach of essential contractual obligations.
liability.cap: Liability is limited to typically foreseeable damages, but not exceeding the compensation paid in the last 12 months.

dataProtection.title: § 8 Data Protection
dataProtection.text: The processing of personal data is carried out in accordance with the Privacy Policy, which is part of these Terms.

changes.title: § 9 Changes to Terms
changes.text: The provider may change these Terms with 30 days' notice. If the user does not object within 30 days of receiving the change notification, the changes are deemed approved.

final.title: § 10 Final Provisions
final.law: Estonian law applies, excluding the UN Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods.
